docs.snippet: His welcome with Buccaneers fans worn out long ago, cornerback Aqib Talib made a soft landing in New England, where he immediately helped stabilize a shaky secondary....
docs.lead_paragraph: His welcome with Buccaneers fans worn out long ago, cornerback Aqib Talib made a soft landing in New England, where he immediately helped stabilize a shaky secondary.
docs.abstract: New England Patriots cornerback Aqib Talib, traded from Tampa Bay Buccanners in Nov 2012, has helped stabilize the team's shaky secondary; Patriots believe Talib can lead team past Baltimore Ravens in AFC championship game.

headline.seo: Talib, a Trouble-Prone Cornerback, Finds a Home With the Patriots
headline.main: Trouble-Prone Talent Finds Home in Patriots
headline.print_headline: Trouble-Prone Talent Finds Home in Patriots

docs.snippet: Torrey Smith, who turns 24 next Saturday, cites Anquan Boldin’s tutelage as a major factor in his development, but theirs is a symbiotic relationship....
docs.lead_paragraph: Torrey Smith, who turns 24 next Saturday, cites Anquan Boldin’s tutelage as a major factor in his development, but theirs is a symbiotic relationship.
docs.abstract: Profiles of Baltimore Ravens dynamic wide receivers Torrey Smith and Anquan Boldin, who have tormented opponents in team's surge to AFC championship game against New England Patriots; Boldin set Ravens postseason receiving record with 145 yards, while Smith burned Denver Broncos cornerback Champ Bailey for two deep touchdown passes.

headline.seo: Smith and Boldin Give the Ravens Dynamic Bookends at Wide Receiver
headline.main: Smith and Boldin Give the Ravens Dynamic Bookends at Wide Receiver
headline.print_headline: Smith and Boldin Give the Ravens Dynamic Bookends at Wide Receiver

docs.snippet: A new Broadway production of “Cat on a Hot Tin Roof” reminds Jeb Brown of the summer 39 years ago when he was cast as one of the kids in “Cat.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: A new Broadway production of “Cat on a Hot Tin Roof” reminds Jeb Brown of the summer 39 years ago when he was cast as one of the kids in “Cat.”
docs.abstract: Actor Jeb Brown, inspired by new Broadway production of Cat on a Hot Tin Roof, looks back to time in 1974 when he was cast as one of the kids in American Shakespeare Theater production of show in Stratford, Conn.

headline.seo: ‘Cat on a Hot Tin Roof’ Was My Introduction to Acting
headline.main: Memories of a Kid on a Hot Tin Roof
